mapper.insert: insert into missingboardreply(pno, replyer, contents, issecret, pid) values (#{pno}, #{replyer}, #{contents}, #{issecret}, #{pid})
mapper.select: select * from missingboardreply where pno = #{pno} order by pid desc, reforder asc
mapper.update: update missingboardreply set contents = #{contents}, issecret = #{issecret}, lastmodifieddate = #{lastmodifieddate}, ismodified = 'Y' where no = #{no}
update missingboardreply set reforder = reforder + 1 where pid = #{pid} and reforder > #{reforder};
mapper.insert: insert into missingboardreply(pno, replyer, contents, pid, depth, reforder, issecret) values(#{pno}, #{replyer}, #{contents}, #{pid}, #{depth} + 1, #{reforder} + 1, #{issecret});
